titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the better discovery of seditious libellers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall this seventh day of January 1675. In the seven and twentieth year of our reign.
Publication date given according to Lady Day dating.
Steele notation: publish, pal 2) seized; the; Arms 87.
Filmed copy at UMI Tract Supplement reel C18 consists of one contiguous sheet.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
